response.overview: Of the not-infrequent load-launching moments that Collins fudge-packs inside this latest edition of "Sodomania," hightlights includes a noms-worthy scene of Tiffany Mynx sucking Tom Byron's load out of Nyrobi Knight's bung-hole, Byron's beachside rump-roasting of trash-talking Johnni Black, and a vid-ending three-guy-on-four-gal anal orgy which culminates in a flurry of man-meat spewing onto a hungry female kisser. Do yourself a favor and stock multiple copies. This series is one popular mutha.
response.title: Sodomania 18
